body.value: Every form of spirituality relates to every other in a fluidly interconnected dynamic. Discover each one’s place and purpose as well as which will benefit you the most.
The core staple of spiritual practice. Realize the nature of reality that is always already the case and embody that Truth to the fullest in each moment.
Reality is so infinite, there’s enough room for every religion on this planet to be valid in some fashion. Learn to see the fabric that weaves them into a harmonious whole.
Very few spiritual circles teach the importance of clear contemplation in understanding and integrating spiritual realizations.
Study the nature of the metaphysical identity known as the soul and explore the various phenomena that it experiences.
Learn about all the various paranormal abilities that are possible in an infinite reality.
Cutting-edge courses for those seeking to develop abilities above the norm.
Explore the vast and colorful diversity of beings that exist.
How does psychedelic practice relate to spirituality? Find the cross-section between traditional spiritual realizations and other states of consciousness.
Is the Law of Attraction actually a Law or more of a skill? Does it always work? There’s many undiscussed nuanced to this subject that you’ll only find being discussed here.
Incorporating spirituality into tangible life benefits means integrating insights of wisdom into practical tools.

Sometimes, Conspiracy Theories turn out to be true and reveal crucial things about the world that you were missing. As such, these topics can’t just be left off the table. They need to be discussed in an intelligent detached manner.
